title: An Act relative to no-cost calls for incarcerated individuals

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scanlon of North Attleborough, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Adam J. Scanlon relative to no-cost calls for incarcerated individuals.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.
